title: Jar And Cover
description: Medium thin glass. Domed foot with folded-under edge, supports body of inverted pear-shape with slender portion about two-thirds height of jar without cover. Short cylindrical neck. Cover is high dome, narrowing to hold flattened round knob. Lid has horizonatally protruding hollow rim and collar fits down over neck of jar.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jar And Cover.
glass. Bequest of Georgiana L. McClellan. 1953-17-148-a,b.
